resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104374</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104374</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">PLoS Medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Médecine de PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medicina De PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Medicina Di PLoS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medicina De PLoS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PLoS Medicine is an international, multidisciplinary medical journal that publishes outstanding human studies that substantially enhance the understanding of human health and disease. PLoS Medicine aims to promote translation of basic research into clinical investigation, and of clinical evidence into practice. PLoS Medicine encourages papers that cross disciplines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Medizin ist ein internationales, 
multidisziplinäres medizinisches Journal, das hervorragende 
menschliche Studien veröffentlicht, die im wesentlichen das 
Verständnis der menschlichen Gesundheit und der Krankheit erhöhen. 
PLoS Medizin zielt darauf ab, Übersetzung der 
Grundlagenforschung in klinische Untersuchung und des klinischen 
Beweises in Praxis zu fördern. PLoS Medizin regt Papiere an, 
die Kreuz diszipliniert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La médecine de PLoS est un journal médical 
international et multidisciplinaire qui édite les études humaines 
exceptionnelles qui mettent en valeur sensiblement l'arrangement de 
la santé humaine et de la maladie. La médecine de PLoS vise à
favoriser la traduction de la recherche fondamentale dans la recherche
clinique, et de l'évidence clinique en pratique. La médecine 
de PLoS encourage les papiers que la croix discipline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A medicina de PLoS é um jornal médico 
internacional, multidisciplinary que publique os estudos humanos 
proeminentes que realçam substancialmente a compreensão da saúde 
humana e da doença. A medicina de PLoS aponta promover a 
tradução da pesquisa básica na investigação clínica, e da 
evidência clínica na prática. A medicina de PLoS incentiva os
papéis que a cruz disciplina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La medicina di PLoS è un giornale medico 
internazionale e pluridisciplinare che pubblica gli studi umani 
eccezionali che aumentano sostanzialmente la comprensione della salute
umana e della malattia. La medicina di PLoS mira a promuovere la
traduzione di ricerca di base su ricerca clinica e di prova clinica in
pratica. La medicina di PLoS consiglia alle carte che la 
traversa disciplina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS η ιατρική είναι ένα διεθνές, διεπιστημονικό 
ιατρικό περιοδικό που δημοσιεύει τις σημαντικές ανθρώπινες 
μελέτες που ενισχύουν ουσιαστικά την κατανόηση της ανθρώπινης 
υγείας και της ασθένειας. PLoS η ιατρική στοχεύει να 
προωθήσει τη μετάφραση βασικής έρευνας στην κλινική έρευνα, και 
κλινικών στοιχείων σχετικά με την πρακτική. PLoS η 
ιατρική ενθαρρύνει τα έγγραφα που διασχίζουν τις πειθαρχίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La medicina de PLoS es un diario médico 
internacional, multidisciplinario que publica los estudios humanos 
excepcionales que realzan substancialmente la comprensión de la salud
humana y de la enfermedad. La medicina de PLoS apunta promover 
la traducción de la investigación básica en la investigación 
clínica, y de la evidencia clínica en práctica. La medicina 
de PLoS anima los papeles que la cruz disciplina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104374</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
